Package ohos.agp.components

Class ComponentState

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentState

  • public class ComponentState
extends Object
    Defines the component state.

    The component state can be COMPONENT_STATE_HOVERED, COMPONENT_STATE_FOCUSED, COMPONENT_STATE_SELECTED, or COMPONENT_STATE_PRESSED.

    Since:
    2

      Indicates the selected state.

      • isStateMatched

        public static boolean isStateMatched​(int stateFlag,
                                     int stateMask)
        Checks whether a state matches the given state.
        Parameters:
        stateFlag - Indicates the state to check.
        stateMask - Indicates the given state.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the state matches the given state; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
